thag1.34:1.1: It's always better for a smart person
thag1.34:1.2: to avoid sharing a seat with such women.
thag1.34:1.3: I went from the village to the wilderness;
thag1.34:1.4: from there I entered a house.
thag1.34:1.5: Though I was there to be fed,
thag1.34:1.6: I got up and left without taking leave.
